name: Bethania Servina
story: Betty used to be a receptionist at the Dunning Insane Asylum. Was extremely beautiful and admired. Used to be scared of Gene.
She got divorced, lost friends. Gene was the only one whose respect for her didn't change, event after she started gaining weight.
She helped Gene escape and got heavily reprimanded. Her work became a living hell until Gene came back and gave her the power to gith back against her abusive colleagues.

name: Tayebeh Zinah
tips: Favors folding knives, darts and needle-shooting.
